alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nocatee, or near Ponte Vedra Beach, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Unf, Ponte Vedra Beach, Neptune Beach, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, Nocatee, Bayard, Durbin, Craig Field and San Pablo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
